title: Textile, late 19th–early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, metallic thread
Technique: weft-faced plain weave patterned by weft bands and slit tapestry
description: Blue ground with four groups of four yellow and metallic weft bands at either side of a central motif showing three blue diamonds set in yellow and metallic thread.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, late 19th–early 20th century.Medium: cotton, metallic thread
Technique: weft-faced plain weave patterned by weft bands and slit tapestry. 1969-98-15.
